snippet: The supermarket chain also raised its full-year profit forecast and announced a $1 billion share repurchase plan.
abstract: Kroger Co reports fiscal first-quarter profit of $439.4 million, or 78 cents a share, up 1.6 percent from $432.3 million, or 71 cents a share, from the year-ago quarter; revenue rose 5.8 percent to $29.1 billion from $27.5 billion.
lead_paragraph: The supermarket chain also raised its full-year profit forecast and announced a $1 billion share repurchase plan.

headline.seo: Kroger’s First-Quarter Profit Rose on Lower Costs
headline.main: First-Quarter Profit at Kroger Rose on Lower Costs
headline.print_headline: First-Quarter Profit at Kroger Rose on Lower Costs
